title: Asana's Work Tracking & Project Management Features
content: Asana offers a comprehensive work management platform with features for project management, goals and reporting, workflows and automation, resource management, and admin and security. Key capabilities include task and project organization, various project views (list, calendar, timeline, Kanban), custom fields, and status updates. The platform also integrates AI-powered features for smart workflows and assists, and connects with hundreds of other tools.
